00025 void Batch :: batchUpdate (char **filelist, long numFiles, long timeFrame)
00026 {
00027     for (long i = 0; i < numFiles; i ++)
00028         batchAdd (filelist [i], timeFrame);
00029 }
00030 
00036 void Batch :: batchAdd (char *infile, long timeFrame)
00037 {
00038     FILE *inFp, *outFp;
00039     real *dataBlock;
00040     long frameID;
00041     MFCC m1;
00042     Wave w1;
00043     short * waveData;
00044     double ** mfccData;
00045 
00046     dataBlock = (real*) calloc (_CEPSTRALCOEFS, sizeof (real));
00047 
00048     w1.waveRead(infile);
00049     waveData = (short *) calloc (w1.getNumChannels() * w1.getNumSamplesPerChannel(), sizeof (short));
00050     w1.waveLoad(0, w1.getNumSamplesPerChannel(), waveData);
00051     w1.waveDownmix(waveData, waveData);
00052 
00053     m1.MFCCcompute (waveData, w1.getSampleRate(), w1.getNumSamplesPerChannel(), mfccData, _BATCHTEMPFILE, timeFrame);
00054 
00055     // open input mfcc file
00056     if (!(inFp = fopen (_BATCHTEMPFILE, "rb")))
00057     {
00058         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _BATCHTEMPFILE);
00059         exit (0);
00060     }
00061 
00062     // open output mfcc file
00063     if (!(outFp = fopen (_TABLE1NAME, "ab")))
00064     {
00065         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _TABLE1NAME);
00066         exit (0);
00067     }
00068 
00069     frameID = 0;
00070     while (!feof (inFp))
00071     {
00072         if (fread (dataBlock, sizeof (real), _CEPSTRALCOEFS, inFp) != _CEPSTRALCOEFS)
00073             break;
00074 
00075         fwrite (dataBlock, sizeof (real), _CEPSTRALCOEFS, outFp);
00076         fwrite (infile, sizeof (char), _TAB1SONGIDSIZE, outFp);
00077         fwrite (&frameID, sizeof (long), 1, outFp);
00078         frameID++;
00079     }
00080 
00081     free (dataBlock);
00082     free (waveData);
00083     free (infile);
00084     fclose (inFp);
00085     fclose (outFp);
00086 }
